document_data.name: ''Sword of Stonecutting''
document_data.Description: This powerful sword was crafted from [[starmetal]] by [[Allis Lhyssich]] and his [[mage]] contacts of [[Neverwinter]].
document_data.Powers: The ''sword of stonecutting'' had a ''+3'' enchantment. It did extra damage to [[evil]] creatures, and inflicted double to those made of stone.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the owner of [[Allis Lhyssich's Hand Crafted Weapons and Magical Weapons for Noble Causes]] crafted this potent weapon for the [[Heroes of Ascore]] after they recovered a meteorite from [[Tuern]].
